> appreciated.
> james

messages.msgSnippet: hey there, am still trying to find an image of an ieyasu banner. i think that the hard-copy i saw previously was in a book called the samurai sorcebook . the
messages.messageBody:
hey there,
am still trying to find an image of an ieyasu
banner. i think that the hard-copy i saw
previously was in a book called the 'samurai
sorcebook'. the banner contained about 6 or 7
characters and from memory said something about
'killing the impure and realising heaven', blah
blah. any help in my search would be greatly
appreciated.
james

http://movies.yahoo.com.au - Yahoo! Movies
- What's on at your local cinema?
